exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (n : nat) (f1 f2 : naryFunc n), extEqual n f1 f2 -> forall g1 g2 : nat -> naryFunc n, (forall c : nat, extEqual n (g1 c) (g2 c)) -> extEqual n (compose2 n f1 g1) (compose2 n f2 g2) n : nat g1, g2 : naryFunc n h1, h2 : nat -> nat -> naryFunc n Heq1 : extEqual n g1 g2 Heq2 : forall c c0 : nat, extEqual n (h1 c c0) (h2 c c0) c : nat The term "h1" has type "nat -> nat -> naryFunc n" while it is expected to have type "naryFunc (S n)" (cannot unify "nat -> naryFunc n" and "(fix naryFunc (n : nat) : Set := match n with | 0 => nat | S n0 => nat -> naryFunc n0 end) n").

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (n : nat) (g1 g2 : naryFunc n) (h1 h2 : naryFunc (S (S n))), extEqual n g1 g2 -> extEqual (S (S n)) h1 h2 -> extEqual (S n) (evalPrimRecFunc n g1 h1) (evalPrimRecFunc n g2 h2)

Premises:
extEqual : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> naryFunc n -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
evalPrimRecFunc : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> naryFunc (S (S n)) -> nat -> naryFunc n
naryFunc = fix naryFunc (n : nat) : Set := match n with | 0 => nat | S n0 => nat -> naryFunc n0 end : nat -> Set Arguments naryFunc _%nat_scope
extEqualCompose2 : forall (n : nat) (f1 f2 : naryFunc n), extEqual n f1 f2 -> forall g1 g2 : naryFunc (S n), extEqual (S n) g1 g2 -> extEqual n (compose2 n f1 g1) (compose2 n f2 g2)
extEqualTrans : forall (n : nat) (a b c : naryFunc n), extEqual n a b -> extEqual n b c -> extEqual n a c
extEqualSym : forall (n : nat) (a b : naryFunc n), extEqual n a b -> extEqual n b a
extEqualCompose : forall (n m : nat) (l1 l2 : Vector.t (naryFunc n) m) (f1 f2 : naryFunc m), extEqualVector n m l1 l2 -> extEqual m f1 f2 -> extEqual n (evalComposeFunc n m l1 f1) (evalComposeFunc n m l2 f2)
extEqualRefl : forall (n : nat) (a : naryFunc n), extEqual n a a
compose2 : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> naryFunc (S n) -> naryFunc n
evalComposeFunc : forall n m : nat, Vector.t (naryFunc n) m -> naryFunc m -> naryFunc n
Fin.rectS : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) -> Type, (forall n : nat, P n Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (p : Fin.t (S n)), P n p -> P (S n) (Fin.FS p)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : Fin.t (S n)), P n p
primRecFunc : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> PrimRec (S (S n)) -> PrimRec (S n)
PrimRec_sind : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> SProp, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_ind : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Prop, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_rect : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Type, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_rec : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Set, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
Fin.t_ind : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P (S n) Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t -> P (S n) (Fin.FS t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t
Fin.t_sind : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> SProp, (forall n : nat, P (S n) Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t -> P (S n) (Fin.FS t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t
Fin.t_rect : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Type, (forall n : nat, P (S n) Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t -> P (S n) (Fin.FS t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t
PrimRec_PrimRecs_rec : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Set) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Set), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_PrimRecs_ind : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Prop) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Prop), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRecs_PrimRec_rec : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Set) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Set), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n n0 : nat) (p : PrimRecs n n0), P0 n n0 p
PrimRecs_PrimRec_ind : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Prop) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Prop), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n n0 : nat) (p : PrimRecs n n0), P0 n n0 p
charFunction : forall n : nat, naryRel n -> naryFunc n
evalPrimRec : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> naryFunc n
evalConstFunc : forall n : nat, nat -> naryFunc n
Fin.caseS : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) -> Type, (forall n : nat, P n Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (p : Fin.t n), P n (Fin.FS p)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : Fin.t (S n)), P n p
Nat.order_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n -> A (S n)) -> (forall n : nat, n < z -> A (S n) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, A n

```coq
intros n g1 g2 h1 h2 Heq1 Heq2.
unfold evalPrimRecFunc.
rewrite (extEqualCompose2 n g1 g2 Heq1).
rewrite (extEqualCompose2 (S n) h1 h2 Heq2).
reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: intros n g1 g2 h1 h2 Heq1 Heq2. unfold evalPrimRecFunc. rewrite (extEqualCompose2 n g1 g2 Heq1). rewrite (extEqualCompose2 (S n) h1 h2 Heq2). reflexivity.
